task.cwd: Current path. Use wrokspace root if null.
task.cleanExt: file extensions for clean file in unitOutputDir. use * for clear all file. default:(.o,.ppu,.lfm,.a,.or,.res)
task.buildOption.searchPath: Searchpath for units and other system dependent things.(-Fu)
task.buildOption.forceRebuild: Re-compile all used units, even if the unit sources didn’t change since the last compilation.(-B)
task.buildOption.msgIgnore: Is a list of messages numbers which should not be shown.(-vmxxx)
config.env.FPCDIR: Path to FPC sources such as `/usr/local/share/fpcsrc`
lsp.trace.server: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.
lsp.initializationOptions.program: Path to the main program file for resolving references (if not available the path of the current document will be used)
lsp.initializationOptions.overloadPolicy: Policy which determines how overloaded document symbols are displayed
lsp.initializationOptions.maximumComplet: Maximum number of completion items to be returned. If the threshold is reached then `CompletionList.isIncomplete = true`
lsp.initializationOptions.insertCompleti: Procedure completions with parameters are inserted as snippets
Procedure completions with parameters (non-snippet) insert empty brackets (and insert as snippet)
lsp.initializationOptions.includeWorkspa: Workspaces folders will be added to unit paths (i.e. -Fu)
Workspaces folders will be added to include paths (i.e. -Fi)
lsp.initializationOptions.checkSyntax: Syntax will be checked when file opens or saves
lsp.initializationOptions.publishDiagnos: Syntax errors will be published as diagnostics
lsp.initializationOptions.minimalisticCo: Completions contain a minimal amount of extra information
lsp.initializationOptions.showSyntaxErro: Syntax errors as shown in the UI with ‘window/showMessage’
lsp.enum.overloadPolicy_1: Duplicate function names appear in the list
lsp.enum.overloadPolicy_2: After the original definition ignore others
lsp.enum.overloadPolicy_3: Add a suffix which denotes the overload count
config.debug.autoBuild: Enable automatic build of default project before debugging when files have changed
